reviews.title: Not a 4 Star Hotel, OK but nothing speacial,good location to train station
reviews.text: We stayed here for one night in July on our way to Tuscany.
The rooms are hit and miss. Our room was small, with a concrete bed and our friends room a couple of doors away was HUGE and had the same concrete bed, so they tell us.
reviews.title: No doubt - a 4 star hotel! :)

reviews.text: The Hotel Manager who greeted us on arrival, a late arrival by the way, was barely friendly, just barely. No real welcome or feeling of appreciating our business but he checked us in quickly and sent us on our way to our small and huge rooms.
reviews.title: They were very helpful.

reviews.text: The rooms are very old and dated, they look like rooms that have been fitted out with furniture collected from verge collections, nothing really matching, nothing really nice but heck it did the job and it was concrete bed after all.
reviews.title: Not quite a 4 stars hotel

reviews.text: The bathroom was OK nothing great but it did the job.
reviews.title: It was perfect for me...

reviews.text: We stayed at the Windsor Thursday through till Monday while following Scotland in Milan.
reviews.title: Wonderful Windsor!

reviews.text: We were slightly disappointed at the hotel exterior - from the side we approached it looked quite run down. However once inside the foyer we took a lift up to our room which was both spacious and comfortable.
reviews.title: Wonderful Windsor in Mian

reviews.text: A large double bed, wardrobe, and desk still left plenty of space to move around. The bathroom was adequate with a powerful shower. A nice touch was the complimentary mini-bar equiped with soft drinks and water.Our room looked out onto the street and a tram line directly below, however by winding the shutter down the noise was minimum.
reviews.title: Very good, but check your rate
Functional, but could be better
reviews.text: The attitude of the staff was excellent, they couldn't do enough from ordering and ushering you to your taxi, helping with the free internet service, and providing free bar snacks the hotel was excellent.

reviews.title: Nice for the weekend
reviews.text: At a rate of 100 Euros a night the hotel was excellent value in a great location. If you are planning to visit, the "Friends" bar is a great local pub just a minute or so walk from the Windsor :-)
The hotel advertise: "free wi-fi, free minbar, air conditioning, satellite tv"
reviews.title: Stay clear of this hotel

reviews.text: -Well, the free wi-fi was only in the lobby area and not always working. The minibar contained 4 bottles of water and 2 cans of soft drinks and was not re-stocked during the 3 nights stay. Air conditon system could not be operated and the room as very hot. Satellite TV???? Not even the italian channels were viewable (bad reception/snow on the screen). The rooms are not very sound proofed either - be prepared to hear the conversation in the room next door.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel! Good value for money and well situed to visit Milan

reviews.text: Location: The hotel is situated directly next to a very busy road with heavy traffic and tram-lines on two sides of the hotel. Since the hotel is on a street corner the trams makes a tremendous noise when turning the corner. Impossible to keep windows open.
reviews.title: Elegant lodging

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Reception staff generally unfriendly - not serviceminded.
reviews.title: very good location, excellent breakfast, nice price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: No Iron/ironing board available....in a 4* hotel???
reviews.title: Value for money is good!

reviews.text: Stayed here for 2nights on leisure and found my room too small, warm and the air con wasn't working on my 2nd night. I asked the reception to look at it and he said as I only had one night left it was not possible to fix so he suggested I open the window!!! The tv also failed to work due to a faulty wire, but decided not to pursue this. Breakfast was quite nice, reception was rather discourteous.
reviews.title: Crap rooms but not bad location

reviews.text: I went to Milan and surrounding areas mostly for shopping, so I had chosen this hotel because it was not far away from shopping street Corso Buenos Aires, next to Central Station - 5-10 minutes walk,and 2 stops by metro to Dome.Actually it takes you 30-40 minutes afoot to get the centre if you prefer to stroll around but it's not so interesting 'coz you don't have any sights on your way.
reviews.title: Very good hotel with excellent breakfast

reviews.text: The room was ordinary.Small and clean.I just didn't like much the color - all in some agressive colors of dark red and blue.Old TVset was changed into the new plasma one during my staying.Free cable internet.Minibar included some soft drinks and mineral water.The view from the window was a big construction with 2 hoisting cranes ;).
reviews.title: Four stars ma non troppo

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The bathroom had bidet.Toiletries included soap, shoe polish, ear pads.But no toothpaste and toothbrush.
reviews.title: Not trust in Internet service

reviews.text: If you are sensitive towards noise outside - be aware of tram noise that begins very early and may hurt your sleeping.
reviews.title: Clean hotel in the centre of Milan

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: the hotel's central location meant that we were conveniently placed for all we wished to see and do. the metro is so close and the only improvement to the website would be to post which is the nearest of the many exits from the metro. Despite being on the corner where the trams squeak round, our fourth -floor room was quiet. It was comfortable and large enough for a three night stay.. We only took breakfast once as we had booked on a room only basis but the buffet fare was plentiful and well up to standard> It was a bonus on Easter Monday to have a massive street market across the road and down many of the side street. We would definitely use again
reviews.title: ticked all the boxes

reviews.text: Nice location, close to metro
reviews.title: Nice location

reviews.text: Nice breakfast not so great variety
reviews.title: great wee hotel

reviews.text: Nice rooms, not modern type.
reviews.title: Stuck in the '70 ...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Do not listen to the moaners in other reviews - this is a great hotel -
reviews.title: Never again!

reviews.text: Hotel Windsor
reviews.title: Windsor Hotel good base
Won't Stay Again
reviews.text: A good location between the station and Duomo, ideal for those girls doing their shopping in the "Golden Rectangle"
Reception was great when we arrived and said we would not use the lifts and take the stairs to our room, on the 6th floor. They moved us immediately to the 1st Floor, very considerate.
reviews.title: Ideal Location Immaculate Hotel
Expensive in Milian
reviews.text: Rooms were large with nice clean bathrooms.
